Class HTTPClient.ModuleException 

java.lang.Object
    |
    +----java.lang.Throwable
            |
            +----java.lang.Exception
                    |
                    +----HTTPClient.ModuleException
public class ModuleException
extends Exception
Signals that an exception occured in a module.

Since:
V0.3
Version:
0.3 30/01/1998
Author:
Ronald Tschalär

ModuleException()
Constructs an ModuleException with no detail message.
ModuleException(String)
Constructs an ModuleException class with the specified detail message.

ModuleException 
public ModuleException()
Constructs an ModuleException with no detail message. A detail message is a String that describes this particular exception.

ModuleException 
public ModuleException(String msg)
Constructs an ModuleException class with the specified detail message. A detail message is a String that describes this particular exception.

Parameters:
msg - the String containing a detail message
